entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.3.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated Docker build badge by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/593
  • V25 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/594
  • Add espeak-ng to colab install by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/595
  • fixed #590, fixed remove miniconda3 folder on linux/mac by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/599
  • V25.3.22 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/compare/v25.3.21...v25.3.22

entry.title: New release for ebook2audiobook: v25.4.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed Kaggle Notebook by @Rihcus in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/598
  • Fixing torch version variant issues by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/601
  • reverting back to bark as default test.... by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/602
  • test bark #27 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/603
  • added Jamie voice by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/604
  • test bark #28 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/605
  • Fixing xpu build by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/608
  • Adding Details on GPU Variants by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/609
  • Fixing GPU Variants Auto-builds by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/610
  • Docker build fix + import error fix by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/611
  • Fix XPU build + import error by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/612
  • Adding pull-always to compose by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/614
  • Added GPU tags into in compose file by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/616
  • Adding Pull Always to compose by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/615
  • Add pull always to docker run commands by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/617
  • Add Pull always to docker run commands in readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/618
  • Improve Readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/619
  • Improve Readme merge by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/620
  • Add docker pull counter by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/622
  • Add docker pull counter by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/623
  • Update docker file location in readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/624
  • Add cuda128 nightly by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/627
  • Add cuda128 variant for docker by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/628
  • Remove unnecessary description of docker by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/629
  • Remove unnecessary docker description from readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/630
  • Adding lite build option by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/632
  • add lite version by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/633
  • Add tune Kaggle link + modernize fine-tune section by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/636
  • Fix Type by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/638
  • Kaggle fine-tune notebook+Streamline readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/637
  • Remove unnecessary readme lines by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/639
  • Remove unnecessary lines in readme by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/640
  • xtts finetune Colab by @Rihcus by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/641
  • Add fine-tune colab by @Rihcus by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/642
  • Fix typo by @Rihcus by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/643
  • Fix typo by @Rihcus by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/644
  • fix typo by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/645
  • fix workflow typo by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/647
  • Fix typo by @Rihcus by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/651
  • Revert "Fix typo by @Rihcus" by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/652
  • Kaggle patch 1 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/653
  • Merge pull request #653 from DrewThomasson/kaggle-patch-1 by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/654
  • Fix finetune kaggle + colab link by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/655
  • Fix finetune kaggle + colab link by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/656
  • v25.4.25 p1 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/675
  • Bypass proxy when performing healthcheck on localhost by @HenryKleinschmidt in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/668
  • Add Manual Python install guide by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/658
  • Add More Fine-tuned xtts models by @DrewThomasson in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/634
  • v25.4.25 p2 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/680
  • merge main commit to v25 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/681
  • resync last functions.py by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/682
  • V25.4.25 by @ROBERT-MCDOWELL in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/683

New Contributors

  • @Rihcus made their first contribution in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/598
  • @HenryKleinschmidt made their first contribution in https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook/pull/668
